subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /LC's Radio Shack Hack Recordings/earths_time_up_12208.wav 
  Uploaded by : lcdupla <lcdupla@...> 
  Description : 12208 RS 12-470: I asked what does "The earth...they need...our word" mean?  I hear, "Earth's time up."  You'll need headphones... 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/LC%27s%20Radio%20Shack%20Hack%20Recordings/earths_time_up_12208.wav

Regards,
